title: A Treasure of Bone & Promises
description: A dark fairytale fantasy following the young heroine Caewen on a journey through wild mountains and dark forests, finally to meet the charmed and eerie Wisht Folk, where she will find that what seemed to be a straightforward quest is not quite as simple as those around her may want her believe... Some elements of the cover design use brushes produced by the wonderful www.obsidiandawn.com.
author: Hob Goodfellowe
